00022 require_once 'creole/common/StatementCommon.php';
00023 require_once 'creole/Statement.php';
00024 
00032 class MSSQLStatement extends StatementCommon implements Statement {
00033     
00042     public function executeQuery($sql, $fetchmode = null)
00043     {
00044         $this->updateCount = null;                
00045         $this->resultSet = $this->conn->executeQuery($sql, $fetchmode);
00046         $this->resultSet->_setOffset($this->offset);
00047         $this->resultSet->_setLimit($this->limit);
00048         return $this->resultSet;
00049     }
00050 
00051 
00065     public function getMoreResults()
00066     {
00067         if ($this->resultSet) $this->resultSet->close();        
00068         $this->resultSet = null;
00069         return false;        
00070     }
00071          
00072 }
